content.text: Hi, my name is User 1. I'm lusting after the neighbor pool boy. I tend to argue with myself more than I argue with other people. I collect toys wearing little rain coats. I enjoy mystery flavor cake and I believe I hear voices.
Hi, my name is User 2. I don't like green eggs and ham. I enjoy swimming. I have a missing pinky toe. I love cooking. I have 4 dogs.
What's your favorite thing about swimming?
I love the feeling of the water on my skin. It's so refreshing.
I agree! I also love swimming because it's a great way to get exercise.
Me too! I usually swim for at least an hour every day.
Wow, that's a lot of swimming! I usually only swim for about 30 minutes.
I love swimming so much that I even joined a swim team when I was in high school.
That's awesome! I wish I had been that dedicated to swimming.
It was a lot of fun, but it was also a lot of hard work.
I'm sure it was. But it's worth it to be able to swim like a fish.
Exactly! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play video games.
Me too! I love to read, especially fantasy novels.
I love fantasy novels too! I'm currently reading the Wheel of Time series.
I've heard good things about that series. I'm currently reading the Lord of the Rings series.
I love the Lord of the Rings! It's one of my favorite series of all time.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new movie coming out.
Me too! I'm sure it's going to be amazing.
